title: In Versus Mode, characters from the anime, including Tanjiro and Nezuko, can be freely matched against each other in a 2 vs 2 setting with up to 2 players on or offline! Enjoy this simple but exhilarating battle system, and become the greatest demon slayer you can.
description:
Become the blade that destroys demons In Adventure Mode, follow Tanjiro through the story from the Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba anime as he faces demons in order to turn his sister Nezuko, who has become a demon, back into a human.
In Versus Mode, characters from the anime, including Tanjiro and Nezuko, can be freely matched against each other in a 2 vs 2 setting with up to 2 players on or offline! Enjoy this simple but exhilarating battle system, and become the greatest demon slayer you can.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD Phenom ll X6 1100T
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2GB | AMD Radeon HD 7950, 3GB
